item.title: Adding Anims
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

[quote=“Berky-Scape, post:2, topic:318505”][quote]if(j == 6000) {
int file = 1686;
Class20 a = aClass20Array351[j];
if(FrameStart[file] < 1)
Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file);
int[] frames = {75,75, 62,62,93,93,93,82,82,57,57,71,71,66,66,66,61,92,73,73,65,65,89,89,70,70,81,81,67,67,67,84,59,63,63,99,99,78,69,69,96,96,74,74,74,79,90,90,94,94,58,0};
a.anInt352 = frames.length-1;
a.anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1];
a.anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1];
a.anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1];
a.anInt363 = 0;
a.anInt364 = 0;
for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++){
a.anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]+FrameStart[file];
a.anIntArray354[i2] = -1;
a.anIntArray355[i2] = 1; //Decrease this if you want to speed it up
}
}[/quote]
Thats the code for it.
Also add the .dat in your cache, or where it belongs to be.[/quote]
what would be the Emote Id for this?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Anims
item.dc:creator: @Berky-Scape Berky-Scape
item.description:
@Berky-Scape wrote:

if(j == 6000) { int file = 1686; Class20 a = aClass20Array351[j]; if(FrameStart[file] < 1) Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file); int[] frames = {75,75, 62,62,93,93,93,82,82,57,57,71,71,66,66,66,61,92,73,73,65,65,89,89,70,70,81,81,67,67,67,84,59,63,63,99,99,78,69,69,96,96,74,74,74,79,90,90,94,94,58,0}; a.anInt352 = frames.length-1; a.anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1]; a.anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1]; a.anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1]; a.anInt363 = 0; a.anInt364 = 0; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++){ a.anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]+FrameStart[file]; a.anIntArray354[i2] = -1; a.anIntArray355[i2] = 1; //Decrease this if you want to speed it up } }
Thats the code for it. Also add the .dat in your cache, or where it belongs to be.

item.title: Adding Anims
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

How Would I go about adding new animations I tried to add D claws anim, and it dosent work it just does some weird glitch emote

I added

if(j == 3505){ int file = 1686; Class20 a = aClass20Array351[j]; if(FrameStart[file] < 1) Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file); int[] frames = {75,75,62,62,93,93,93,82,82,57,57,71,71,66,66,66,61,92,73,73,65,65,89,89,70,70,81,81,67,67,67,84,59,63,63,99,99,78,69,69,96,96,74,74,74,79,90,90,94,94,58,0}; a.anInt352 = frames.length-1; a.anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1]; a.anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1]; a.anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1]; a.anInt363 = 0; a.anInt364 = 0; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++){ a.anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]; a.anIntArray354[i2] = -1; a.anIntArray355[i2] = 2; //Decrease this if you want to speed it up } }
to my class 20, and the things in the anims, folder did I miss something?
